cp:coreProperties.dc:creator: The MathWorks, Inc.
cp:coreProperties.dc:description:
Bouncing Ball Model
This model calculates the trajectory, over time, of a ball thrown upward with a velocity of 15 meters per second from a height of 10 m. The position of the ball is plotted in the upper axis of the scope while the velocity of the ball is plotted in the lower axis. For the recommended approach to modeling a bouncing ball, type 'sldemo_bounce' at the MATLAB prompt.
